newsitem.title: USA: Glasgal has two deals with Cisco Systems.
newsitem.headline: Glasgal has two deals with Cisco Systems.

text.p: Glasgal Communications Inc said Friday that Cisco Systems Inc has agreed to use a Glasgal unit as a subcontractor and to license another Glasgal unit's systems integration software.
The company said the two agreements will generate several million dollars during its current fiscal year, which ends April 30, 1998.
The first agreement calls for Cisco to use Glasgal's Datatec Systems unit will provide network staging and implementation services to some of Cisco's customers, the company said.
The second deal calls for Cisco to license software owned by Glasgal's CASI unit as part of Cisco's Advanced Installation Services program.
